# sampleType

**Instance Property**

The data type of samples that match this descriptor.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var sampleType: HKSampleType { get }
```

## Discussion

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/data-types].

## Accessing Descriptor Data

- **predicate**: The predicate that filters samples matching this descriptor.
